Class Deck

java.lang.Object
Deck
public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
a deck class to have a normal 52 card deck

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> currentDeck
    stores the current deck as an array list of strings
    private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> START_DECK
    a basic un-shuffled deck array list, storing each "card" as a string with the value because suit is not relevant in blackjack does not store the suit of each card

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Deck()
    constructor for a deck

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String dealACard()
    deals the top card of the deck and removes it from the deck
    void resetDeck()
    resets current deck to a basic 52 card deck
    int score​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> hand)
    scores the hand in accordance with blackjack rules
    void shuffleDeck()
    shuffles current deck to be in a random order
